original_text: He said, ‘For 23 years the Lord has been giving me his messages. I started to tell you his messages when Amon's son Josiah had been ruling Judah for 13 years. I have continued to tell you many times what the Lord has said, even until today. But you have refused to listen.
korean_text: 유다의 왕 아몬의 아들 요시야 왕 열셋째 해부터 오늘까지 이십삼 년 동안 여호와의 말씀이 내게 임하기로 내가 너희에게 꾸준히 일렀으나 너희가 순종하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: the Lord has been giving me his messages
I started to tell you his messages
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 그분의 메시지를 전하기 시작했습니다

sentences.original_text: when Amon's son Josiah had been ruling Judah for 13 years
sentences.korean_translation: 아몬의 아들 요시야가 유다를 다스린 지 13년이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: I have continued to tell you many times
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 여러 번 계속해서 너희에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: But you have refused to listen
